CustomField.description: Type a User's name into this field to have them added to the Opportunity Team as a Sales Engineer. If the user has already been added, typing their name will remove them from the Opportunity Team.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Type a User's name into this field to have them added to the Opportunity Team as a Sales Engineer. If the user has already been added, typing their name will remove them from the Opportunity Team.
CustomField.label: Sales Engineer

lookupFilter.errorMessage: User must be a Sales Engineer
